question: ________ is the planning, organizing, and controlling of the movement of raw materials and ultimately finished goods to end consumers.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Transportation is just one aspect of moving raw materials.
That’s not correct. Marketing channels are the intermediaries who help distribute products to consumers.

That’s not correct. Supply chain management involves managing all the members and activities from the procurement and transformation of raw materials into finished goods through their distribution to targeted consumers.
Logistics is the planning, organizing, and controlling the movement of raw materials and ultimately finished goods to end consumers

detailedSolution: Logistics is the planning, organizing, and controlling the movement of raw materials and ultimately finished goods to end consumers
